entry.title: US SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance
entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 26, 22:30 PDT Â -Â Oct 27, 02:00 PDT Oct 25, 23:42 PDT Scheduled - Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 26 October 2022 at 22:30 PDT until 27 October 2022 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Verizon handsets from a subset of longcodes.

entry.summary: THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 26, 22:30 PDT Â -Â Oct 27, 02:00 PDT Oct 25, 15:48 PDT Scheduled - The US Cellular network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 October 2022 at 22:30 PDT until 27 October 2022 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US Cellular handsets.

entry.title: Scheduled infrastructure maintenance
entry.summary: Oct 26, 07:00 CEST Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed. Oct 26, 05:00 CEST In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary. Oct 18, 15:33 CEST Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Wednesday 26th of October, between 5 AM and 6 AM CEST, when you can expect few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services will be affected: - Migrations will not be available - Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed - Logins to platform might be affected - Registration of new subscribers won't be possible - Invitations of new team members won't be possible - E-mails and notifications might be delayed - Password reset won't be possible - Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.

entry.title: Requests to create room amenity photos failing (Listing Photos POST Request)
entry.summary: Oct 21, 16:03 PDT Resolved - We have identified an issue with creating room amenity photos. The issue would cause POST requests to fail with either a 404 error or a 500 error. This issue approximately started from last Friday, October 14th, 2022. The photo creations are successful in most cases but the requests fail at a later stage resulting in error responses. We have fixed this issue at 3:30pm PT today, but there can be duplicate photos created for room amenities during this time. We advise you to review room amenity photos and use the DELETE endpoint to remove duplicate photos. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

We continue to work toward full resolution. entry.summary:
Incident began at 2022-10-20 11:29 and ended at 2022-10-20 14:40 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

The problem with Google Workspace Support has been resolved. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience and continued support.

Affected products: Google Workspace Support

entry.title: Incident: Some users are having issues searching in Slack, seeing the "Something went wrong" message.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 19, 2022, from 8:17 AM to 10:13 PM PDT, some users saw a "Something went wrong" error when attempting a search query.
This issue was caused by a recent code change that resulted in searches failing.
We reverted this change, which fixed the issue for all users after a reload of Slack.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Oct 18, 16:16 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 18, 16:05 UTC Update - Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted ubuntu-22, leading to high wait times. Other hosted labels and self-hosted runners are not impacted. We are actively working on mitigations. Oct 18, 15:53 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident: Some users are experiencing issues loading Slack, including the Threads view, Saved items, notifications, API hyperlinks, and group DMs/channels
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 13, 2022 from 3:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. PDT, a number of customers had trouble loading and receiving thread notifications. Some customers may have also had trouble with loading channels, adding users to group direct messages, API hyperlink rendering, and missing Saved items.
A mass de-provisioning event inadvertently increased load across our infrastructure, causing issues with Threads for many users.
As an immediate mitigation strategy, we temporarily deactivated the Threads view for all users.
In parallel, we ended the long running de-provisioning jobs, and significantly scaled up the systems that handle those jobs. We also made several code changes to reduce the effect a de-provisioning job of this scale would have on our infrastructure, and redistributed some of the load across other parts of the system.
The optimisation and redistribution work brought error rates down, which resolved most of the issues with channel loading, group direct messages, hyperlinks, and Saved items that users were experiencing.
At this point, we made the call not to re-enable the Threads view in order to give our recovery efforts more time to restore balance to the system.
Once the load was appropriately balanced across our infrastructure, and we were able to confirm that our up-scaling systems were prepared to handle any future spikes, we re-enabled the Threads view for all users.

entry.title: Incident: Some users may be experiencing issues with loading Slack.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
Starting around 12:00 AM PDT until 08:30 AM PDT on October 12, 2022, some users experienced issues with connectivity and threads loading.
We discovered that an unusually large number of requests within a short timeframe resulted in a database failure causing errors and slowness. The issue has since been resolved.
Please contact feedback@slack.com for a Root Cause Analysis if one is required for your team.

entry.title: Airbnb.com Listing and Payment page Degradation
entry.summary: Oct 11, 15:58 PDT Resolved - This incident has been resolved - it was active between around 11:00 and 11:30 am PDT. While the incident was active, you may have noticed an increase in 500 errors across all our endpoints. Hosts and guests might have been unable to access listings through the Airbnb website. We apologize for the inconvenience. Don't hesitate to contact us via the Support Portal if you need additional information. Oct 11, 12:26 PDT Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for this issue, and we are now monitoring the results. Oct 11, 11:57 PDT Investigating - We are investigating an issue that is preventing the retrieval of some listings and reservation acceptance.

entry.title: Incident: When switching channels, items that open on the right-hand side including threads, mentions & reactions, and saved items hide immediately.
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On October 10, 2022 from 5:04 PM PDT to 11:01 PM PDT, some users experienced issues when switching channels in Slack. This resulted in saved items, threads, mentions and reactions, (as opened on the right-hand side) being hidden immediately.
We identified that the issue was the result of a recent update. We have rolled back this change which has fixed the issue for all impacted users.

entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From 12:46 PDT on October 3, 2022 until 7:42 PDT on October 6, 2022, customers on the Free and Pro plans using a confirmation code to log in, saw an invalid code error when entering the code they received by email.
The issue was traced to a recent update. Reverting this update fixed the issue for all affected customer.

entry.title: Facebook and Instagram apps
entry.summary: Oct 6, 01:17 CEST Resolved - We resolved the issue with Facebook OAuth app. Now, everything should be back to normal. Reauthorization of your Facebook connection is not needed. If you experience issues with your Facebook connection, please, go to Connection tab, find your Facebook connection and click the button "Reauthorize". Then, follow the steps in the new window, where you confirm access to your Facebook account. Oct 5, 22:54 CEST Investigating - Facebook and Instagram apps Facebook has temporarily revoked our Facebook OAuth app. Therefore, Facebook and Instagram connections in Integromat and Make have expired. We are working on a fix ASAP. You might need to reauthorize your Facebook connection then. Affected apps: Facebook, Facebook Ads Campaign Management, Facebook Catalogs, Facebook Conversions API, Facebook Custom Audiences, Facebook Groups, Facebook Insights, Facebook Lead Ads, Facebook Offline Conversions, Facebook Pages, Instagram for Business.

entry.title: Evolution - New Calendar Interface
entry.summary:
Improvement Â Â Good news! After releasing the new calendar interface, many of you reacted, we thank you for that, and we heard your feedbacks ! We did some evolutions to adapt the calendar new interface and make it match your needs. What are the main evolutions? 1- More listings displayed In the first version of new calendar interface the planning was limited to 25 properties, now it goes up to 100 properties. 2- The filters Few hours after the release we enabled all the 8 filters ! 3- The logos more visible The logos of the sources are now colored in white, it makes them more visible Small tipðŸ’¡ Some of you need to visualize more properties on the planning view. If you zoom out your calendar page you can make the lines thinner and be able to see more properties.
We invite you to discover all these evolutions, and hope it will help you to have a better management of your calendar, save more time, and make more bookings ! Wishing you all a pleasant day!

entry.title: DDoS attack mitigated
entry.summary: Oct 3, 10:07 CEST Resolved - This incident has been fully resolved. Sep 29, 11:41 CEST Update - Due to the DDoS attack, Make servers were unable to receive some webhook requests from our customers and as a result, such data couldn't be delivered to scenarios. In some instances data was redelivered at a later point, but in order to be sure, we advise that you reload any data from the app-list below that was uploaded during the following time frames (times shown in CET): 26.9.2022 18:00 - 27.9.2022 15:20 27.9.2022 19:20 - 27.9.2022 23:50 Our investigation revealed webhooks coming from those apps were affected: Slack, Zoom, Facebook Lead Ads, Intercom, Segment, Todoist, Quickbooks, Square, Instagram, and Box Sep 28, 15:22 CEST Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and the service is now stâ€¦

entry.title: Incident: Issues downloading files on Slack Android app version 22.09.30
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
Starting September 21st around 1:00 PM PDT until September 28th 3:00 PM PDT, users experienced trouble downloading files on Slack's Android app version: 22.09.30. We traced the problem to a permissions check error which caused file downloads to not execute.
We corrected the permissions check error in the latest version of the Android app: 22.09.40, and the file download functionality was restored. Some impacted users may need to update their Slack app to version 22.09.40 from the Google Play Store.

entry.title: Issue Affecting Reservation Related Webhooks
entry.summary: Sep 28, 15:36 PDT Resolved - This incident was resolved on September 21st at 1:00 p.m. PDT. If you still see reservations missing webhook notifications, don't hesitate to reach back out. Sep 21, 14:46 PDT Update - We are actively working to find a solution to this issue. In the meantime, we have backfilled all the missed reservation webhook notifications since September 15. We will post more updates as soon as we have them. Sep 21, 10:51 PDT Identified - We have identified an issue affecting the sending of reservation related webhooks starting on September 15th, we are actively working on it and will post more updates when we have them. This incident does not affect all reservations, only a limited number of them. If you notice that some of your Hosts' reservations webhooks are missing, for example when you accept a make_reservation SAC, but you did not receive a confirmation webhook afterwards, use the GET reservations API to retrieve the reservation status.

entry.title: AWS service degradation affecting Notion integrations
entry.summary: Sep 28, 14:42 PDT Resolved - The AWS issue has been resolved, and external integrations in Notion affecting link previews and database syncs are functioning normally again. Sep 28, 10:58 PDT Identified - An AWS service degradation has resulted in users unable to authenticate external integrations in Notion, affecting link previews and database syncs. We are investigating potential mitigations while AWS works to resolve the issue.

entry.title: Incident: Some Enterprise Grid users are unable to retrieve channel lists when building workflows and webhooks
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
From September 26, 2022 at 7:00 AM PDT until September 27, 2022 at 12:40 PM PDT, some Enterprise Grid users were not able to create new webhooks, share posts to a channel, or select a channel from the dropdown menu in Workflow Builder. We traced this problem to a change that was made to improve how channel objects are loaded into Slack. We disabled this change, restoring functionality to impacted users.

We are working on mitigation. As a workaround, you can use VS Code Desktop. Sep 28, 03:53 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident: Issues with legacy message attachments
entry.summary:
Issue summary:
On September 26, 2022 from 12:00 PM PDT to 11:48 PM PDT, link formatting was broken for all Slack apps.
Some messages were showing the URL and not a link itself. We determined that this issue was caused by a recent code change that altered how attachment links in the app were formatted.
We reverted this change which fixed the issue for all users after a force reload of Slack.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.summary: Sep 27, 15:06 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sep 27, 15:00 UTC Update - We've applied a mitigation to resolve delayed job updates for running Actions. Sep 27, 14:33 UTC Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.
